rooms.description: Large contemporary living area with an open-concept design; adjacent to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation. Vastu compliant with south-east orientation.
Modern dining room that overlooks the central courtyard; designed with luxury finishes and ample space for social gatherings. Aligned as per Vastu recommendations.
State-of-the-art kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage; strategically placed near the living area for convenience, following north-east orientation as per Vastu.
Luxury master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; positioned in the northeast direction to maximize positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Well-appointed secondary bedroom; designed for comfort and privacy while ensuring good ventilation and lighting.
Dedicated home office space with ample natural light from adjacent windows facing the courtyard; positioned in north-east quadrant to enhance productivity.
Additional bedroom designed for guests or family use, ensuring sufficient privacy and comfort. Vastu-aligned with good energy flow.
En-suite bathroom integrated into the master bedroom, designed for luxury and functionality while adhering to local norms.

openings.description: Primary entrance facing north, ensuring a welcoming entry with emphasis on positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Window opening in the living room that faces the central courtyard for enhanced natural light and ventilation.
Window in the dining area overlooking the courtyard to maintain a connection with nature.

features.description: A central courtyard providing natural light and ventilation throughout the home, serving as an outdoor living space.
Dedicated home theater area located in a quiet corner of the ground floor; designed with soundproofing and luxury finishes.

rooms.description: Secondary master bedroom on the upper floor with en-suite bathroom and private balcony for luxury living; designed per Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort, well-connected to the central courtyard via a staircase landing.

openings.description: Balcony offering panoramic views of the courtyard and garden area, enhancing the luxury feel.
Window openings that ensure ample natural light and ventilation for the upper floor bedrooms.

features.description: Elegant staircase connecting the ground floor and upper floor; designed with safety and aesthetics in mind.
A secondary home office on the upper level offering a quiet workspace with a view of the courtyard.
